value.package.json:
{
  "name": "react-native-web-vite-start",
  "private": true,
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "description": "A React Native Web starter application using Vite for web and React Native CLI for mobile",
  "homepage": "https://markhazleton.github.io/react-native-web-start",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/markhazleton/react-native-web-start.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/markhazleton/react-native-web-start/issues"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "react-native",
    "react-native-web",
    "vite",
    "typescript",
    "cross-platform",
    "ios",
    "android",
    "starter"
  ],
  "author": "Mark Hazleton",
  "license": "MIT",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0",
    "npm": ">=9.0.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "copy-assets": "node scripts/copy-assets.js",
    "predev": "npm run copy-assets && node scripts/generate-build-info.js",
    "dev": "vite",
    "preweb": "npm run copy-assets && node scripts/generate-build-info.js",
    "web": "vite",
    "generate-build-info": "node scripts/generate-build-info.js",
    "css:build": "tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/main.scss -o ./dist/assets/main.css --watch",
    "css:build-prod": "tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/main.scss -o ./dist/assets/main.css --minify",
    "sass:build": "sass src/styles:dist/assets/styles --watch",
    "sass:build-prod": "sass src/styles:dist/assets/styles --style=compressed --no-source-map",
    "clean": "node scripts/clean.js",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean",
    "build": "node scripts/build.js",
    "postbuild": "echo Build completed! Output in ./dist/",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "serve": "vite preview --port 3000",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "android": "react-native run-android",
    "ios": "react-native run-ios",
    "start": "npm run dev",
    "start:mobile": "react-native start",
    "start:web": "npm run dev",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
    "test:ci": "jest --ci --coverage --watchAll=false --passWithNoTests",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write .",
    "format:check": "prettier --check .",
    "security:audit": "npm audit",
    "security:fix": "npm audit fix",
    "security:check": "npm audit --audit-level=moderate",
    "security:full-check": "node scripts/security-check.js",
    "copy-docs": "node scripts/copy-docs.js",
    "copy-docs:win": "if not exist \"public\\documentation\" mkdir \"public\\documentation\" && Copy-Item -Path \"documentation\\*\" -Destination \"public\\documentation\\\" -Recurse -Force && Copy-Item -Path \"README.md\" -Destination \"public\\documentation\\\" -Force",
    "copy-docs:unix": "mkdir -p public/documentation && cp -r documentation/* public/documentation/ && cp README.md public/documentation/",
    "update-docs": "npm run copy-docs",
    "verify-docs": "node scripts/verify-docs.js",
    "predeploy": "npm run build",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d dist",
    "deploy:gh-pages": "npm run predeploy && npm run deploy",
    "deploy:manual": "npm run predeploy && npm run deploy",
    "rebuild": "npm run clean && npm run build"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "marked": "^16.4.1",
    "react": "^19.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.0",
    "react-native": "^0.82.1",
    "react-native-render-html": "^6.3.4",
    "react-native-web": "^0.21.2"
  },
  "overrides": {
    "markdown-it": ">=12.3.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.28.4",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.28.3",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.28.4",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.38.0",
    "@react-native-community/cli": "^20.0.2",
    "@react-native/babel-preset": "^0.82.1",
    "@react-native/eslint-config": "^0.82.1",
    "@react-native/metro-config": "^0.82.1",
    "@react-native/typescript-config": "^0.82.1",
    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4.1.15",
    "@testing-library/dom": "^10.4.1",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.9.1",
    "@testing-library/jest-native": "^5.4.3",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.0",
    "@testing-library/react-native": "^13.3.3",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/jest": "^30.0.0",
    "@types/marked": "^6.0.0",
    "@types/react": "^19.2.2",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.2.2",
    "@types/react-native": "^0.73.0",
    "@types/react-test-renderer": "^19.1.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.46.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.46.2",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^5.0.4",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.21",
    "babel-jest": "^30.2.0",
    "eslint": "^9.38.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^7.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.24",
    "gh-pages": "^6.3.0",
    "identity-obj-proxy": "^3.0.0",
    "jest": "^30.2.0",
    "jest-environment-jsdom": "^30.2.0",
    "metro-react-native-babel-preset": "^0.77.0",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
    "react-test-renderer": "^19.2.0",
    "sass": "^1.93.2",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.15",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
    "vite": "^7.1.11"
  }
}
